Name: Celestial Herald
Story Background: Born from the planes of blinding light, the Celestial Herald embodies divine justice and protection, swooping down to defend the innocent and punish the wicked.
Ability: Flying, Lifelink. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile random nonland opponent's permanent. Return that permanent to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Appearance Description: The Celestial Herald is a radiant figure with iridescent wings, emanating a soft, golden glow. Its gaze is piercing, yet benevolent, and its presence inspires hope and courage.
